input_text:
Job Title: Multi-Site Property Manager

Location: Silver Spring, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Sales

Description:
Harbor Group Management Company is a multi-billion dollar real estate investment and property management firm. As we continue to grow, we are looking for passionate, goal oriented, creative individuals with an entrepreneurial spirit and great communication skills. Harbor Group is dedicated to outstanding customer service and providing exquisite living experience for our residents.

Multi-Site Property Manager 

The Purpose:

In a Multi-Site Property Manager role, you will be responsible for the operational and financial aspect of two or more properties and meeting the company goals in those areas.

Key Role Responsibilities:

Operate the property within the financial guidelines and approved budgetFacilitate optimum performance of the property in areas such as personnel management, leasing, collections, resident services, maintenance, revenue enhancement, capital improvements, information reporting and complianceManage vendor/contractor relationships concerning work scheduling, billing, and certificates of insuranceDesign, implement and maintain a resident retention programPerform physical inspections of the property and verify condition of vacant apartmentsPerform evictions, utility cut-offs, and landlord liens as required on delinquent rentals

Primary Requirements Include:

At least 2 yearsâ€™ experience in multifamily property managementDeveloped supervisory and leadership skillsExperience in rent collection, G/L postings, daily deposits, SODASMRI knowledge highly preferredSolid experience with MS OfficeFamiliarity with real estate contracts and leasesIdeal candidate will possess experience in one or more of the following areas: Senior Housing, Affordable or High-Rise

What We Offer:

Competitive Salaries & BonusesMedical, Dental & Vision Plans401(k) Plan With Employer Matching ContributionsPaid Personal Time & HolidaysFlexible Spending AccountsFree Long-Term DisabilityFree Life InsuranceShort Term DisabilityHealth Savings Account with Employer ContributionsWellness PerksFinFit Health Finance ProgramEmployee Apartment DiscountEmployee Referral ProgramEmployee Recognition & AwardsEmployee Assistance ProgramVolunteer & Community Service OpportunitiesTuition Reimbursement

Veteran Friendly

This pre-employment application will be given every consideration, but its receipt does not imply that the applicant will be employed. Each question should be answered in a complete and accurate manner as no action can be taken on this application until all questions have been answered.

Harbor Group Management is proudly an Equal Opportunity Employer EOE/M/F/D/V. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.summary: Responsible for operational and financial aspects of multiple properties, meeting company goals in areas such as personnel management, leasing, collections, resident services, maintenance, revenue enhancement, capital improvements, information reporting, and compliance.

Facilitate optimum performance in areas such as personnel management, leasing, collections, resident services, maintenance, revenue enhancement, capital improvements, information reporting, and compliance
Manage vendor/contractor relationships concerning work scheduling, billing, and certificates of insurance
Design, implement, and maintain a resident retention program
Perform physical inspections of the property and verify condition of vacant apartments
Perform evictions, utility cut-offs, and landlord liens as required on delinquent rentals
